name: Light Tank
description: Friendly Tanks shooting at a Tank within Close Range of this Tank gain +1 [Firepower]

name: Medium Tank
description: When Shooting, this Tank may Re-roll [Blank] Attack dice.

name: Heavy Tank
description: When Defending, this Tank may Re-roll [Blank] Defense dice.

name: Tank Destroyer
description: This Tank gains +1 [Survivability] while in Cover.

name: Self-propelled Guns
description: Other Tanks do not block this Tanks Line of Sight

name: Arrow Shot
description: When attacking you must Modify a [Critical] to a Hit [Hit]

name: Assault Gun
description: This tank has a Restricted Line of Sight and Fixed Field of Fire.

name: Big Gun
description: When Attacking you may Modify a [Hit] to a [Critical].

name: Fortress
description: When this tank is the target of a Side Shot, do not subtract a Defense die.

name: Light Flank
description: When this tank is a target of a Side Shot, subtract an addition Defense die.
